abstract: The Web site of the Internet retailer Amazon.com was down for at least an hour on Friday.
snippet: The Web site of the Internet retailer Amazon.com was down for at least an hour on Friday.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE 3:35 P.M.: Amazon’s site is back up again. A statement and some factual details from an Amazon spokesman have been added below.

headline.main: Amazon’s Web Site Goes Down: An ‘Unplanned Event’
